Text: Thanks 20-40, this looks interesting, i do like these films alot more with subs & not dubbed.
Gives it a nice complete look. Anyway, thanks for the movie. Looks good.

Because there are 2 chinese languages, you have to be careful these days because it can be dubbed from one chinese to another (mandarin/cantonese)

Not saying its the case here, just something to look out for.

thx for the upload 20/40
